Hey, y’all thanks for reading my very first review! I had a ton of fun writing and drawing this one up and I hope it gives some ideas on what to try out or look for in terms of packers. Packing isn’t for everyone, but I found that it’s a really nice sometimes thing for me!

  • Portfolio

Matthew here, to add in some links!
Thank you, Jey! You can find this specific packer in a few spots listed below, but after that, we’ve also put in the rest of OJST’s affiliated stores, as there really are a whole swath of packers out there to explore. My recommendation? If this one doesn’t grab at you, take a peek at the New York Toy Collective for some choice options (we’ve reviewed a couple of their packers in the past!)

Finally, if you want to see more of Jey’s work – and heck Why WOULDN’T YOU?!– here’s a list of the comics they’ve made for OJST!

item.title: Cake For Breakfast by Hien Pham
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Today Hien’s back with a stunning Long Distance Relationship comic that gets all kinds of sexy and fun. Seeing this comic come together was a rollercoaster for me; it reminded me of all those years of LDR that Erika and I went through. It really hit close to home and reminded me of our early […]
item.content:encoded:
Cake For Breakfast by Hien Pham

by Matthew Nolan on 11/30/2021 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Fun Smutty Comics »
  • Guest Comics

Today Hien’s back with a stunning Long Distance Relationship comic that gets all kinds of sexy and fun.

Seeing this comic come together was a rollercoaster for me; it reminded me of all those years of LDR that Erika and I went through. It really hit close to home and reminded me of our early romantic life and just made me feel things.

Long Distance is hard as fuck. For everyone out there keeping their relationship alive long distance: You all deserve some cake.

*
  • Portfolio
  • Interactive stuff
  • Twitter
  • Instagram
  • Sexy Comics

*PS: Hien had to sex-ducate me with today’s comic, I legit didn’t know ‘cake’ was a thing 0_0 Gettin’ old, Nolan! Gettin’ old.

PPS. Here’s some other LDRs comics to peek at =D

item.title: My Adult Dating Anxiety by Liv Hamilton
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Dating can be daunting and especially so when you’re just beginning to do it later in life than your peers. We’re so appreciative of Liv Hamilton for talking about their experience of coming out and going out as an adult when “everyone else” has been doing it since their teen years- or, at least, that’s […]
item.content:encoded:
My Adult Dating Anxiety by Liv Hamilton

by Matthew Nolan on 11/16/2021 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Guest Comics »
  • Interviews »
  • Non-Fiction Comics »
  • Sex & Sexuality

Dating can be daunting and especially so when you’re just beginning to do it later in life than your peers. We’re so appreciative of Liv Hamilton for talking about their experience of coming out and going out as an adult when “everyone else” has been doing it since their teen years- or, at least, that’s what it feels like. If you’re looking for the first step in tackling your own queer dating anxiety, read 7 Ways for Gay Singles to Overcome Dating Anxiety.

Now go check out more of Liv’s work and don’t let your anxiety hold you back from telling them what a great job they did!

  • Portfolio
  • Twitter
  • Instagram

Here’s a few resources on dating anxiety for queer folks:

item.title: Trying New Things by DicksnDemons
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: It’s getting cold outside so let’s turn up the heat. DicksnDemons is here today with a sweet, sexy, intimate and NSFW comic. That’s just… gosh… oh-so-lovely. Follow along as we take a short dive into this couple’s sexploration and strap-on adventure! Then when you’re done, go tell this talented artist just how awesome he is! […]
item.content:encoded:
Trying New Things by DicksnDemons

by Matthew Nolan on 11/09/2021 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Fun Smutty Comics »
  • Guest Comics

It’s getting cold outside so let’s turn up the heat.
DicksnDemons is here today with a sweet, sexy, intimate and NSFW comic. That’s just… gosh… oh-so-lovely. Follow along as we take a short dive into this couple’s sexploration and strap-on adventure!

Then when you’re done, go tell this talented artist just how awesome he is!

  • NSFW Twitter
  • SFW Twitter
  • FurAffinity
  • Kofi

Today’s comic got you yearning to strap in for more strap-on content? We understand.
Check it out:
– All our Harness Comics
– All our Strap-On Comics
– A wonderful comic on DIY Harnessing by Isabella Rotman
– A fun short comic on the ‘Share’ by Trystan Falcone
– Erika and my’s review of our most favsies harness, the Jaguar (and our favsies pegging dildo for it, the Velvet!)

In other news!

While I still need to update some copy about it on some of the pages, I’m super excited to announce that we’ve finally settled on this year’s Sponsorship. Oh Joy Sex Toy is once again supported by OMGYes.com for the whole of this next year. They’re ensuring we don’t need to make use of crazy ads to keep this ship rolling! I can’t express how much Sponsorship means to us and the site. In addition to the vital support we get from Patreon, Sponsorship affords us the ability to pay our guests artists a wage, keep the site updating week-to-week, and keep the site healthy n’ hosted. A few months back the future of OJST was still up in the air (and heck it still might be – we’ll see how things are after 6 months), so to have OMGYes come back ready and willing to support us during these turbulent times, it means everything.

We’ll get them a fresh review when they eventually drop their next season of episodes (soon!), but if you’ve ever been sitting on the idea of a sign up we can’t encourage you more strongly. Check out our previous reviews of season one and season two. This team and website deserve all the sign-ups they can get – AND – it’s just an amazing site.

└ Tags: cock, dick, Dicks and Demons, Dicks n Demons, DicksandDemons, DicksnDemons, dildo, fantasy, fiction, guest, guest comic, harness, nsfw, strap-on, strapon, trans, transgender

item.content:encoded:

by Jey Pawlik on 11/02/2021 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Guest Comics »

Hey everyone, Jey here, with another autobio story for you all!

I’ve been doing erotic comics with my partner since 2013 and wanted to delve into how that started and what it was like. This ended up being my love letter to porn comics which have helped me grow so much as a comic artist, and are my preferred porn of choice!

I’m super excited to be on the OJST team where I’ll be posting monthly comics for you all! Strap in and strap on!

item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Wash away the day’s stress with this deep dive into Hien Pham’s local Gay Sauna. I can’t be more excited about this comic – I love journalistic pieces like this and even more so when it’s by Hien AND made just for OJST. Thank you so much for going above and beyond and sharing this […]
item.content:encoded:
Steamed Buns by Hien Pham

by Matthew Nolan on 10/26/2021 at 12:02 am
  • Adventures »
  • Comic »
  • Favorites »
  • Guest Comics »
  • Interviews »
  • Non-Fiction Comics

Wash away the day’s stress with this deep dive into Hien Pham’s local Gay Sauna.

I can’t be more excited about this comic – I love journalistic pieces like this and even more so when it’s by Hien AND made just for OJST. Thank you so much for going above and beyond and sharing this slice of life with us Hien!

This one reminds me heavily of the time Erika and I visited Club Sesso and a Swingers Party. While I’m giving you some links to open up, check out the rest of Hien’s comics he’s made for us these past few months: Side Effect Right Effect (a comic on SSRIs and Hien’s Libido) and I’ve got a Friend in Me (a reflective body-positive artist thought piece). I highly recommend giving his amazing work a read (and then hitting him up on his socials!)

  • Portfolio
  • Interactive stuff
  • Twitter
  • Sexy Comics

Last week, we had a soft launch for the new OJST team (of which Hien Pham is a part of – woop!) This week we’re soft launching the new sponsorship banners! We’re trying out some ‘rotating images this year of cute mMsturbateers, all in the spirit of promoting this year’s sole sponsor OMGYes.com! Hope you like them, Erika and I had a ball designing them and fixing the site up for it =D We truly love OMGYes and feel ever so thankful for their continued support this turbulent year. Give the site a look!

item.title: Out And About With Confidence by Monty P
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Today we’ve got Monty’s personal story of growth and development. He shows us the spark of confidence he found and how he grew it into a blaze that he carries with him everywhere. It’s a lovely piece and I hope it encourages anybody who needs it – you can be who you want to be. […]
item.content:encoded:
Out And About With Confidence by Monty P

by Matthew Nolan on 10/19/2021 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Guest Comics »
  • Non-Fiction Comics »
  • Sex & Sexuality

Today we’ve got Monty’s personal story of growth and development. He shows us the spark of confidence he found and how he grew it into a blaze that he carries with him everywhere. It’s a lovely piece and I hope it encourages anybody who needs it – you can be who you want to be.

  • Twitter
  • Tumblr

We’re having a soft launch for the new site direction this week. I’ve been busy trying to remove and add in fresh parts. If you’re out of the loop; it’s all a part of slow transition for us here at OJST away from the ‘Matt and Erika’ show into more of a team and guest artists-focused site. We’ll make a louder song and dance about it later on as there’s still so much to do. But we hope you’re liking the new vibe and direction!

└ Tags: autobio, confidence, guest, guest comic, Monty, Monty P, trans, transgender, transition

item.title: Talk Me Into It by Gutsy
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Hot and spicy one this week, with a smidge of D/s, CBT, and denial. It’s lovely to get a little more kinky-fun representation on the site- Gutsy really went all out with today’s comic. This week’s short fictional comic (depicting two long-time, loving and practiced kinksters playing with some serious BSDM) is here to titillate, […]
item.content:encoded:
Talk Me Into It by Gutsy

by Matthew Nolan on 09/28/2021 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Fun Smutty Comics »
  • Guest Comics »
  • Kinks

Hot and spicy one this week, with a smidge of D/s, CBT, and denial. It’s lovely to get a little more kinky-fun representation on the site- Gutsy really went all out with today’s comic.

This week’s short fictional comic (depicting two long-time, loving and practiced kinksters playing with some serious BSDM) is here to titillate, not educate. We can’t squeeze it all into a comic, so stuff that would be important to know if you wanted to try out some of this stuff is missing. Stuff like how to practice D/s & CBT safely, the before-play conversations, safe words, and aftercare (to name a few). My point is; if the subject matter in today’s comic piques your interest, go out and do some more research! This isn’t a how-to-guide!

That all being said, if you find a moment or two to spare in between those kink-research chapters, please make sure to go say thank you to Gutsy! It really is a delightfully sexy comic!

  • Twitter
  • Filthy Figments
  • Patreon

A whole lot of Gutsy’s work can be found on Filthy Figments; go read our review of that wonderful site!

And if you liked this weeks comic, maybe go check out our other similar categories: Fun Smutty Comics & Kinks

└ Tags: bdsm, boss, bossy, CBT, Cock & Ball Torture, cock and ball torture, D/s, dom, fiction, guest, guest comic, Gutsy, Gux, kink, kinky, powerplay, sub, subby

item.title: What Ace Means To Me by Ell J Walker
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Today’s lovely piece of autobiography comes to you from the talented Ell J Walker! I love comics like this – discovering yourself and finding home in a definition and group. That feeling of finally feeling seen and represented! Twitter Portfolio Gladr (Webcomic) Etsy Check out our similar comics on Sexuality and our ACE comics. Updates […]
item.content:encoded:
What Ace Means To Me by Ell J Walker

by Matthew Nolan on 09/21/2021 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Education Comics »
  • Guest Comics »
  • Guest Education »
  • Sex & Sexuality

Today’s lovely piece of autobiography comes to you from the talented Ell J Walker!

I love comics like this – discovering yourself and finding home in a definition and group. That feeling of finally feeling seen and represented!

  • Twitter
  • Portfolio
  • Gladr (Webcomic)
  • Etsy

Check out our similar comics on Sexuality and our ACE comics.

Updates for the Site!

Wednesday last week, Erika and I had a sit-down and came up with a fresh battle plan for the future of Oh Joy Sex Toy. We’re both freshly committed to keeping it going, but with the aim of moving Erika away from the project and bringing onboard new and different members to help create a diverse team. We’ll be signing on two semi-permanent guest comic artists to give us regular monthly content, while also getting 2 fresh faces each month. I’ll be bringing on consultants for the editorial, and finally, a Media person to help us with the Social media. In the end, we want to have OJST filled with different voices, creating a safe and positive space for readers and comic artists alike.

Our shopping list of updates and things to change is crazy LONG, and it’s going to take a bit of time before we get to a good resting point. But the future is positive; OJST with its own voice, not just Erika and Matt’s, made up of guest comics and all sorts. Room enough for Erika to breathe, recharge and maybe explore new projects. But still very much here for her if she decides to come back.

Hopefully, you’ll start to see some changes in the next few months after I’ve gotten the new team together! Wish us luck!

└ Tags: Ace, asexuality, autobio, Ell J Walker, Ell Walker, EllJWalker, EllWalker, guest, guest comic
